posts.post_title: Johnson AB, Lajoie Sov, FS/ trade
posts.post_content:

First "I'll take it" to [url]vc1@cox.net[/url]

Bump- Highest Graded Lajoie with bat Sovereign.
One more shot here. Closest grade to this one is an SGC 50.
